title: Qualitative Research Interview Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational research methodologies and language analysis competencies
context.additional_context: For corporate researchers conducting qualitative studies in language education, utilizing LMS-based self-directed learning and asynchronous discussions.

learning_goals: Design a three-step interview protocol aligned with the research topic through literature analysis.
Develop 15 interview questions applying educational psychology principles.
Generate two types of interview scenarios (human-centered/AI-collaborative) using AI tools.
The validity of the interview guidelines can be verified through a peer review process conducted at least three times.

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Quiz, Discussion Board Features)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
